mapper.sql: select approval_id, apply_id, approval_state, approver_id, approval_time, approval_sight, approval_level, opi, create_time, applicant_id, amount, projectName, isnotice from fac_sys_user_approval
mapper.select: select approval_id, apply_id, approval_state, approver_id, approval_time, approval_sight, approval_level, opi, create_time, applicant_id, amount, projectName from fac_sys_user_approval where approval_state ='2'

select * from fac_sys_user_approval where (apply_id, approval_level) in (select apply_id, max(approval_level) from fac_sys_user_approval where approval_sight = '1' group by apply_id) and isnull(isnotice) and approval_state = '1';

SELECT a.approval_id, a.apply_id, a.approval_state, a.approver_id, a.approval_time, a.approval_sight, a.approval_level,a.opi, a.create_time, a.applicant_id, a.amount, a.projectName, a.isnotice,b.dept_id deptId FROM fac_sys_user_approval a LEFT JOIN sys_user b ON a.applicant_id = b.user_id AND a.approval_state='1' GROUP BY a.apply_id

select * from ( select a.approval_id ,b.type,a.deptName,a.amount,b.dddate sqtime from fac_sys_user_approval a left join fac_traffic_rei_apply b on a.apply_id = b.num where a.approval_state=1 ) d where d.approval_id in (select max(c.approval_id) from (select a.approval_id,b.dddate,a.create_time,b.amount,b.type,a.applicant_id,a.approval_level from fac_sys_user_approval a left join fac_traffic_rei_apply b on a.apply_id = b.num where a.approval_state=1) c where 1=1 group by c.dddate ,c.create_time,c.amount,c.type,c.applicant_id) and not isnull(amount) and not isnull(type)
select a.deptName,a.amount clamount,b.create_time sqtime from fac_sys_user_approval a ,fac_reimburse_apply b where a.apply_id = b.num and b.type in('差旅报销') and a.approval_state =1
select a.deptName,a.amount tjamount,b.create_time sqtime from fac_sys_user_approval a ,fac_reimburse_apply b where a.apply_id = b.num and b.type in('团建报销') and a.approval_state =1

select a.deptname,a.amount dgamount,b.create_time sqtime from (select f.* from fac_sys_user_approval f where approval_level = (select max(approval_level) from fac_sys_user_approval where apply_id = f.apply_id and apply_id like 'DG%' ) and f.approval_state =1) a,fac_pay_public_apply b where a.apply_id = b.num

select * from ( select a.approval_id,b.dd_date sqtime,b.amount bxqtamount,a.deptName from fac_sys_user_approval a left join fac_rei_adi_apply b on a.apply_id = b.num where a.approval_state=1 ) d where d.approval_id in (select max(c.approval_id) from (select a.approval_id,b.dddate,a.create_time,b.amount,b.type,a.applicant_id,a.approval_level from fac_sys_user_approval a left join fac_traffic_rei_apply b on a.apply_id = b.num where a.approval_state=1) c where 1=1 group by c.dddate ,c.create_time,c.amount,c.type,c.applicant_id) and not isnull(bxQTamount)

select * from ( select a.approval_id,b.amount zdamount,b.dddate sqtime,a.deptName from fac_sys_user_approval a left join fac_rei_hospitality_apply b on a.apply_id = b.num where a.approval_state=1 ) d where d.approval_id in (select max(c.approval_id) from (select a.approval_id,b.dddate,a.create_time,b.amount,b.type,a.applicant_id,a.approval_level from fac_sys_user_approval a left join fac_traffic_rei_apply b on a.apply_id = b.num where a.approval_state=1) c where 1=1 group by c.dddate ,c.create_time,c.amount,c.type,c.applicant_id) and not isnull(zdAmount)

SELECT * FROM fac_sys_user_approval WHERE (apply_id, approval_level) IN (SELECT apply_id, MAX(approval_level) FROM fac_sys_user_approval WHERE approval_state = '1' AND approval_sight = '1' AND applicant_id=#{applicantId} GROUP BY apply_id);
select * from fac_sys_user_approval where approver_id= #{approverId} and approval_state='3' and apply_id = #{applyId} order by create_time desc

select * from fac_sys_user_approval where approval_level = (select max(approval_level) from fac_sys_user_approval where applicant_id=#{applicantId} AND apply_id= #{applyId} ) AND applicant_id=#{applicantId} AND apply_id= #{applyId}

SELECT REPLACE ( GROUP_CONCAT( u.user_name, "(", ( CASE WHEN app.approval_state = 1 THEN '同意' WHEN app.approval_state = 2 THEN '驳回' WHEN app.approval_state = 3 THEN '未操作' ELSE '' END ), ")" ), ',', '--' ) allAppNames FROM fac_sys_user_approval app LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.`user_id` = app.`approver_id` WHERE app.apply_id = #{apply_id} ORDER BY app.approval_level
